msg.msgText: Validation of an activation specification failed due to errors found in the property settings for connection configuration: {0}. This error will occur with error CWLNC2340.

msgExplanation.p: Validation of an activation specification can succeed only if there are no errors in the connection property settings.

msgUserResponse.p: Refer to the error output for CWLNC2340 for a complete list of properties with incorrect settings.
